EmailTemplate.description: Welcome email for Online Store Customers that come through DDMN Web Apps for Nebraska contacts.
EmailTemplate.name: Online Store Customer Welcome NE
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for purchasing {!Contact.Product_Purchased__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Weâ€™re excited to welcome you to Delta Dental of Nebraska! You have made a great choice. We have attached your Certificate of Coverage for your records.
As a Delta Dental member, you can access your benefits information anytime via the Member Portal at https://www.deltadentalne.org/myaccount. The Member Portal allows you to manage benefits securely with a tablet, computer or using our mobile application. You can find a participating dentist, check benefits, review explanations of benefits and amounts used toward maximums or deductibles, print ID cards, and more.
Getting Started - Frequently Asked Questions:
Q: When will payment be pulled from my account? A: Typically, payments are pulled the 5th of each month.
Q: Will you be sending me receipts for my payment? A: We do not send receipts, but you can visit https://www.deltadentalne.org/myaccount anytime to view and print receipts.
Q: When will I receive my ID card? A: Your ID card will be available for you to print or download from the Member Portal
Q: How can I update my payment election information? A: Your payment election information can be found by logging into https://www.deltadentalne.org/myaccount. If you wish to make changes to your payment information you can do so within the site.
For other general questions and the latest information on your benefits, please visit our FAQs online at https://www.deltadentalne.org/myaccount.
Congratulations on making the smart choice to protect your smile!
Sincerely,
Delta Dental
Please do not reply to this email. This email is sent from a mailbox that does not accept replies.
